ABOUT ME

[/gt3_custom_text][gt3_spacing height=”14px”][gt3_custom_text text_color=”#42474c” font_size=”36″ line_height=”128″]

Hello! I am Dr. Sandra Miller

[/gt3_custom_text][gt3_spacing height=”18px”][vc_separator color=”custom” el_width=”75px” accent_color=”#d9e0e4″ css=”.vc_custom_1514368377265{margin-bottom: 32px !important;}”][gt3_custom_text text_color=”#5c656d” font_size=”18″ line_height=”167″]

Today you are one step closer to a new you where you feel empowered and on a positive path to growth and well-being. As a cognitive-behavioral, solution-focused therapist, my goal is to help you uncover your true potential and lead a life that is worth celebrating. While we can’t change difficult situations of the past, we can work together to better understand and resolve challenges in your life.

[/gt3_custom_text][gt3_spacing height=”22px”][gt3_custom_text text_color=”#42474c” font_size=”18″ line_height=”167″ use_theme_fonts=”” google_fonts_text=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”]
